ygData.subject: Guk Raid on National Day
ygData.msgSnippet: To all: This bloody thing is still ON! So far, these people have more or less comfirm that he/she/it is going: T1 Garren W1 Leshrec (BTW, Lesh, are you still
ygData.messageBody:
To all:

This bloody thing is still ON!

So far, these people have more or less comfirm that he/she/it is going:

T1 Garren
W1 Leshrec (BTW, Lesh, are you still alive? Seen several of your
enchanter's corpse in Minotaur caves, and you have not log on in days)
W2 Ziltus
T2 Yiyang
WT1 Zanderion
H1 Einan
T3 Kenven
T4 Aaleku
C1 Kellendil
WT2 Nicademous
H2 Trifrost
T5 Yutaka (Make sure you don't drive your taxi on that day.)
W3 Satoru
W4 Ling (Ziltus, tohlong contact)
S1 Deadflower (Ziltus, please send this e-mail to this goon, send tells
to him, never respond one)
WT3 FlyingFox

and both your parang carrying Bard S2 Sereph and Holy Band-aid(Tunare's
Handyplast. Best in Singapore and JB) H3 Fesse will be there. If your
name is not there, it means you did not response to my Tell ingame.

This will PURELY BE A LOOT RAID. You won't gain much XP, main piority is
loot loot loot and more loot.

At 7:00 CST on the 6th of August 1999, Friday. (China coast time, time
zone for Hong Kong, S'pore and some parts of eastern china. offset is
GMT +08:00) we will all start to assemble at the EC tunnel to North Ro.
Those that need to be bind, will be dragged over to East FP to be binded
first before setting off.

Once the clock hit 8:00. Tri will SOW ALL of us, and we'll run towards
Guk, shouting over the zone. What you want to shout is not my problem.

If enough goons appear before 8:00, we might go to Najera to get some
FBRs first. Note that this MIGHT not happen. Our main objective is till
frog killing.

Now on items, these are the items I know of, that spawns in Upper and
Lower(yes, we ARE going in there) Guk. Add the code I place next to your
name, if you want the item. Please do so by Thursday evening, else, you
will not get it.

Woven parts-
Crown of the Froglock Kings(Can attempt to try) -
Silver plated parts - S2/H3
Excecutor's Hood (another maybe) -
Shimmering Orb -
Chiton Shell Shield(not comfirm, think it is spawn in Upper Guk on a
spider) - H3
Bracelet of Woven Grass -
Serpentine Bracer (another maybe) -
Elf Hide Gloves - S2
Troll Hide Gloves - S2
Flowing Black Silk Sash (another maybe) - S2
Embroidered Black Cape (another maybe) -
Adamantite stuff (unless we are fucked up lucky, we won't be able to get
it, under the pray and you'll get it someday category) -
Collar of Undead Protection -
Gatorscale stuff -
Sack that reduce 80% weight which name I forgot (Really, that's the
name! ;)-
Guise of the Deceiver (Maybe........) -
Ghoulbane (Garren and Aaleku, pray that the place is not camp) -
Azure Sleeves (maybe) -
Dark Reaver (no SK leh.... under the I dream some more, should be able
to get it item)
Mesh stuff -
Some black colour mace - H3
Short Sword of the Ykesha (must dream a HELL LOT to get it)
Ebony Bladed Sword (maybe, just maybe) -
Runed Bone Fork - S2
Executioner's Axe(Dream like hell) -
